name: Mama's Potato Salad
author: JULIEP
summary: This is a recipe my boyfriend's mother always made for him growing up. I made it, at his request, for his birthday, and it was a huge hit at the party!
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place the potatoes in a large pot with enough water to cover
Bring to a boil, and cook for about 10 minutes, or until tender
Drain, and place in a serving bowl
Stir the onion, salt and pepper into the potatoes while they are still hot
This allows the potatoes to absorb the flavor
Allow to cool for about 20 minutes
Add the mayonnaise, mustard and horseradish to the salad, and mix well
Gently stir in the eggs and dill pickles
Finish off with a generous grinding of black pepper on top
Chill for about 30 minutes before serving
